results.title: The possibility of simvastatin as a chemotherapeutic agent for all-trans retinoic acid-resistant promyelocytic leukemia.
results.text_hl: The possibility of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ as a chemotherapeutic agent for @CHEMICAL_Tretinoin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014212 @@@all-trans retinoic acid@@@-resistant @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Promyelocytic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015473 @@@promyelocytic leukemia@@@.
